name: mile-quest-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK infrastructure for Mile Quest

scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npx cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:cognito: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuestCognitoStack
scripts.deploy:database: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuestDatabaseStack
scripts.deploy:api: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuestApiStack
scripts.deploy:monitoring: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuestMonitoringStack
